trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings" /> objects.
A <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettingsCollection> object contains a collection of <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings> objects.
Each <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings> object represents a single entry in the `<connectionStrings>` configuration-file section.
trans-unit.target: 각 <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings> 개체의 단일 항목을 나타냅니다는 `<connectionStrings>` 구성 파일 섹션.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to access the <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettingsCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 액세스 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.는 <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettingsCollection>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example is an excerpt from the configuration file used by the previous example.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 앞의 예제에서 사용 되는 구성 파일에서 발췌 한 내용입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettingsCollection" /> class.
A <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings" /> object to add to the collection.
Adds a <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings" /> object to the collection.
The following example shows how to add a <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings> object to a <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettingsCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: 추가 하는 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings> 개체는 <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettingsCollection> 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: Removes all the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings" /> objects from the collection.

The <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettingsCollection.Clear%2A> method removes all the connection strings from the configuration file at the current configuration hierarchy level and writes a `<clear>` tag in the file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettingsCollection.Clear%2A> 메서드는 현재 구성 계층 구조 수준에서 구성 파일에서 모든 연결 문자열을 제거 하 고 작성 한 `<clear>` 파일의 태그입니다.

trans-unit.source: The `<clear>` tag signifies that all the connection strings defined in the parent configuration files are disregarded by the system.
trans-unit.target: `<clear>` 태그는 부모 구성 파일에 정의 된 모든 연결 문자열은 시스템에서 무시 된다는 것을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to remove all the <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings> objects from the <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettingsCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: 모두 제거 하는 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings> 에서 개체는 <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettingsCollection> 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings" /> object in the collection.
Returns the collection index of the passed <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings" /> object.
The collection index of the specified <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettingsCollection" /> object.
The following example shows how to get the index of the specified <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings> object.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 지정 된 인덱스를 가져올 <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings" /> object in the collection.
The index of a <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings" /> object in the collection.
Gets or sets the connection string at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션의 지정된 인덱스에 있는 연결 문자열을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings" /> object at the specified index.
In C#, this property is the indexer for the <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettingsCollection> class.

The following example shows how to access a <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings> object at a given index in a <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettingsCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 액세스 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.는 <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings> 에서 지정한 인덱스에 개체는 <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettingsCollection> 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings" /> object with the specified name in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션에서 지정된 이름을 가진 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings" /> 개체를 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings" /> object with the specified name; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 이름의 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings" /> 개체 또는 <see langword="null" />(개체가 없는 경우)입니다.

trans-unit.source: In C#, this property is the indexer for the <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettingsCollection> class.
The following example shows how to access a named <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings> object in a <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettingsCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 명명 된 액세스 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다. <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings> 개체는 <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettingsCollection> 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: Removes a <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings" /> object from the collection.
A <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings" /> object in the collection.
Removes the specified <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings" /> object from the collection.
The following example shows how to remove the specified <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings> object from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 지정 된 제거 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다 <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings> 컬렉션의 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The name of a <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings" /> object in the collection.
Removes the specified <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings" /> object from the collection.
The following example shows how to remove the <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings> object with the specified name from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 제거 하는 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings> 컬렉션에서 지정한 이름 가진 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The index of a <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings" /> object in the collection.
Removes the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings" /> object at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션의 지정된 인덱스에 있는 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings" /> 개체를 제거합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to remove the <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings> object at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 제거 하는 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings> 개체 컬렉션에서 지정 된 인덱스입니다.
